en-US.summary: Get weather forecasts and current conditions from the National Weather Service
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Clima Cast for the weather
Alexa, ask Clima Cast for the forecast
Alexa, ask Clima Cast for alerts
en-US.name: Clima Cast
en-US.description:
Using information provided by the National Weather Service, Clima Cast gives you the current conditions and the 7-day forecast for your area or any other United States city.

You can ask for current conditions, forecasts, and active weather alerts.

When first using Clima Cast, you must set a default location.

For complete information and examples, please refer to the skill description.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: To test, set a location first by saying 'set location to Boulder Colorado', then ask for weather or forecasts.
